name: • All site personnel inducted (includes environment and cultural)
• Required Safe Work Method Statements completed and signed
• Installation of soil erosion and sedimentation controls completed in accordance with Soil and Water Specs.
• Air quality to be visually monitored for dust etc. as a direct result of construction activities.
• WITNESS POINT: Notice of inspection of base/subgrade before covering 1 day before laying underlay or placing concrete
• HOLD POINT: Formwork design certification 3 days before erecting formwork – for in situ box culverts and retaining walls only
• HOLD POINT: Completed formwork certification 1 day before placing concrete (HP)
• WITNESS POINT: Notice of inspection of completed formwork
• WITNESS POINT: Notice of inspection of completed reinforcement
• HOLD POINT: Machine mixing: Submit proposals for mixing, placing, finishing, and curing. Include the following where relevant
• HOLD POINT: Submit results to show that concrete has achieved 95% of its design strength 1 day before superimposed load
